description.value: CodeSystem with error codes for the NUM-CODEX data-transfer processes

definition.value: An unknown error occured

display.value: Patient Not Found

definition.value: The referenced Patient could not be found in the local FHIR repository

display.value: Bad Patient Reference

definition.value: The given Patient reference does not point to a resource at the local FHIR repository

display.value: Validation Failed

definition.value: Error or fatal error during validaton of FHIR resources

display.value: Ecryption of GECCO Data For CRR Failed

definition.value: Error while ecrypting GECCO data for CRR

display.value: Unable to Store Ecrypted GECCO Data

definition.value: Error while creating Binary ressource with encrypted GECCO data in local DSF FHIR server

display.value: GTH Not Reachable

definition.value: The GTH was not reachable while sending Task to start the translate process

display.value: Download of Encrypted Validation Error From GTH Failed

definition.value: Error while downloading encrypted validation error from GTH

display.value: Decryption of Validation Error From CRR Failed

definition.value: Error while decrypting validation error from CRR

display.value: Download of Encrypted GECCO Data From DIC Failed

definition.value: Error while downloading encrypted GECCO data from DIC

display.value: Unable to Connect to The fTTP

definition.value: No connection could be established with the fTTP

display.value: No DIC Pseudonym For Bloomfilter

definition.value: The fTTP did not return a DIC pseudonym for the given Bloomfilter

display.value: No CRR Pseudonym For DIC pseudonym

definition.value: The fTTP did not return a CRR pseudonym for the given DIC pseudonym

display.value: CRR Not Reachable

definition.value: The CRR was not reachable while sending Task to start the receive process

display.value: Download of Encrypted GECCO Data From GTH Failed

definition.value: Error while downloading encrypted GECCO data from GTH

display.value: Decryption of GECCO Data From DIC Failed

definition.value: Error while decrypting GECCO data from DIC

display.value: Insert Into CRR FHIR Repository Failed

definition.value: Error while inserting data into CRR FHIR repository, not a validation error

display.value: Ecryption of Validation Error for DIC Failed

definition.value: Error while ecrypting validation error for DIC

display.value: Download of Encrypted Validation Error From CRR Failed

definition.value: Error while downloading encrypted validation error from CRR

display.value: Unable to Store Ecrypted Validation Error

definition.value: Error while creating Binary ressource with encrypted validation error in local DSF FHIR server

display.value: Timeout Waiting For Response From CRR

definition.value: Timeout while waiting for a response (process continue) task from CRR

display.value: Timeout Waiting For Response From GTH

definition.value: Timeout while waiting for a response (process continue) task from GTH
